alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Choctaw, northern Oktibbeha, eastern Webster and western Clay Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarkson, or 8 miles east of Eupora, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mathiston and Sherwood around 555 PM CDT. Maben and Cumberland around 600 PM CDT. Pheba around 620 PM CDT. Griffith around 635 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi.
